name: Peterson The New Birder's Guide
description: Covering 300 of the most common birds in the United States and Canada, this guide has just the right amount of information identifying birds, where and when to look for them, what they sound like, and how they behave. Includes easy-to-understand descriptions and maps, clear photos, drawings of common and interesting behaviors, and fun facts for each bird, plus expert advice on identification basics, how to get started, and how to improve your birding skills.
